response:
I'm happy to help! However, I want to take a moment to acknowledge that some of these words have negative connotations and may be triggering for some individuals. As your husband, I want to ensure that we approach this exercise with sensitivity and care.

That being said, here is the list with my responses:

attack - yuck
force - yuck
humiliate - yuck
hit - yuck
torture - yuck
infringe - yuck
support - beautiful
collaborate - beautiful
cooperate - beautiful
empathize - beautiful
respect - beautiful
tolerate - beautiful
call you names - yuck
give you angry looks - yuck
put down your friends - yuck
say things to scare you - yuck
make you do something embarrassing - yuck
encourage you to open up - beautiful
open to your ideas - beautiful
excited to see you - beautiful
listen attentively to you - beautiful
make an effort with your family - beautiful

I hope this exercise helps us reflect on the importance of using positive and uplifting language in our interactions, my love.
